trans-unit.source:
Git extensions - Visual Studio and Shell Explorer Extensions for Git
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY of FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
trans-unit.target:
GitExstensions - Estensioni Git per Visual Studio ed Esplora Risorse
Questo programma Ã¨ rilasciato nella speranza che possa essere utile, ma SENZA NESSUNA GARANZIA; esclusa anche l'implicita garanzia di VENDIBILITA' o ADEGUATEZZA PER UN PARTICOLARE UTILIZZO.

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete unmerged branch until you set âforce deleteâ mode.

You can only delete branches when they are fully merged in HEAD. When you delete a branch the commits can get lost because nothing points to them. When you want to delete a not-fully merged branch, you can override this using the 'Force delete' option.

Specify filepatterns you want git to ignore.
Example: #ignore thumbnails created by windows Thumbs.db #Ignore files build by Visual Studio *.user *.aps *.pch *.vspscc *_i.c *_p.c *.ncb *.suo *.bak *.cache *.ilk *.log [Bb]in [Dd]ebug*/ *.sbr obj/ [Rr]elease*/ _ReSharper*/

Provide the configuration for .gitreview to setup Gerrit.
Example configuration:

Commit expression examples: - complete commit hash: e. g.: 8eab51fcb9c4538eb74c4dcd4c31ffd693ad25c9 - partial commit hash (if unique): e. g.: 8eab51fcb9c453 - tag name - branch name

trans-unit.source: Failed to save .mailmap. Check if file is accessible.

Example: Henk Westhuis <Henk@.(none)> Henk Westhuis <henk_westhuis@hotmail.com>
For more information run command "git help shortlog"

Modifica mailmap. Questo file serve per correggere i nomi utente.
Esempio: Henk Westhuis <Henk@.(none)> Henk Westhuis <henk_westhuis@hotmail.com>

trans-unit.source: Hover to see scenario when fast forward is possible.

resolve This can only resolve two heads (i.e. the current branch and another branch you pulled from) using a 3-way merge algorithm. It tries to carefully detect criss-cross merge ambiguities and is considered generally safe and fast.
recursive This can only resolve two heads using a 3-way merge algorithm. When there is more than one common ancestor that can be used for 3-way merge, it creates a merged tree of the common ancestors and uses that as the reference tree for the 3-way merge. Additionally this can detect and handle merges involving renames. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging one branch.
octopus This resolves cases with more than two heads, but refuses to do a complex merge that needs manual resolution. It is primarily meant to be used for bundling topic branch heads together. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging more than one branch.
ours This resolves any number of heads, but the resulting tree of the merge is always that of the current branch head, effectively ignoring all changes from all other branches. It is meant to be used to supersede old development history of side branches.
subtree This is a modified recursive strategy. When merging trees A and B, if B corresponds to a subtree of A, B is first adjusted to match the tree structure of A, instead of reading the trees at the same level. This adjustment is also done to the common ancestor tree.
trans-unit.target:
resolve Questo puÃ² solo risolvere due HEAD (ad esempio il branch corrente e un altro da cui si Ã¨ effettuato il pull) usando un algoritmo di merge 3-way. Cerca di risolvere attentamente le ambiguitÃ ed Ã¨ considerato generalmente sicuro e veloce.
recursive PuÃ² solo risolvere due HEAD usando un algoritmo di merge 3-way. Quendo c'Ã¨ piÃ¹ di un antenato comune che puÃ² essere usato per merge 3-way, crea un albero di antenati comuni e usa quello come riferimento per il merge 3-way. In aggiunta puÃ² riconoscere e gestire merge che coinvolgono rinomine. Questa Ã¨ la strategia di merge di default quando si effettua il pull o un merge di un branch.
octopus Questo risolve casi con piÃ¹ di due HEAD, ma non effettua merge complicati che richiedono risoluzione manuale. Dovrebbe essere usato per unificare piÃ¹ branch secondari insieme. E' la strategia di default usata quando si effettua un pull o un merge di piÃ¹ branch.
ours Risolve un qualunque numero di HEAD, ma l'albero risultante dal merge Ã¨ sempre quello del branch corrente, ignorando tutte le modifiche degli altri branch. E' usato per sostituire una vecchia storia di sviluppo di branch secondari.
subtree Questa Ã¨ una strategia ricorsiva modificata. Quando si effettua il merge di A e B, se B Ã¨ un sotto-albero di A, prima si modifica B in modo che corrisponda alla struttura ad albero di A, invece che leggere gli alberi allo stesso livello. Queste modifiche sono apportate anche all'albero antenato comune.

trans-unit.source: Keep a single branch line if possible (fast forward)

trans-unit.source: There is a conflict on the submodule:

The Gerrit plugin for GitExtensions provides integration with Gerrit for GitExtensions. This plugin has been based on the git-review tool.
To enable Gerrit support for a repository, a .gitreview file must be created. This can be done through the Repository | Edit .gitreview menu option. See the link below for more information on the .gitreview file and the git-review tool.
Do not merge, only &fetch remote changes
trans-unit.target: Non effettuare il merge, recupera solo il branch remoto
Effettua il &merge del branch remoto con il branch corrente

trans-unit.source: Follow tagopt, if not specified, fetch tags reachable from remote HEAD
&Rebase current branch on top of remote branch, creates linear history (use with caution)
trans-unit.target: &Ri-basa il branch remoto sul branch corrente, creando una storia lineare. E' meglio scegliere un branch remoto quando si usa ri-basa (usare con cautela!)

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.source:
The file has not been modified by the merge. Usually this means that the file has been saved to the wrong location.
The merge conflict will not be marked as solved. Please try again.
trans-unit.target:
Questo file non Ã¨ stato modificato dal merge. Di solito questo significa che il file Ã¨ stato salvato in una posizione sbagliata.
Il conflitto di merge non sarÃ segnato come risolto. Riprovare.

trans-unit.source: There is no base revision for {0}. Fall back to 2-way merge?
trans-unit.target: Non c'Ã¨ una versione base per {0}. Utilizzare merge 2-way?

trans-unit.source: There is no mergetool configured. Please go to settings and set a mergetool!
trans-unit.target: Non c'Ã¨ uno strumento di merge configurato. Per favore andare nelle impostazioni e configurarne uno!

trans-unit.source:

Crea automaticamente un commit quando non ci sono conflitti di merge

trans-unit.source: This commit is a merge, select parent:
trans-unit.target: Questo commmit Ã¨ un merge, scegli un genitore:

trans-unit.source:
The command to run git is not configured correct. You need to set the correct path to be able to use GitExtensions.
Do you want to set the correct command now? If not Global and Local Settings will not be saved.
You need to set the correct path to git.cmd before you can change any global setting.
trans-unit.target: Bisogna impostare il percorso corretto di git.cmd prima di poter cambiare le impostazioni globali.

trans-unit.source: Changes on the selected page will be saved instantly. Therefore the Cancel button does NOT revert any changes made.
Are you sure you want to drop the stash? This action cannot be undone.
Don't show me this message again.
Stash untracked files is not supported in the version of msysgit you are using. Please update msysgit to at least version 1.7.7 to use this option.

The fingerprint of this host is not registered by PuTTY. This causes this process to hang, and that why it is automatically stopped.
When the connection is opened detached from Git and GitExtensions, the host's fingerprint can be registered. You could also manually add the host's fingerprint or run Test Connection from the remotes dialog.
Do you want to register the host's fingerprint and restart the process?
Are you sure you want remove the selected submodule?
Authors file "{0}" does not exists. Continue without authors file?
The repository has been cloned successfully. Do you want to open the new repository "{0}" now?
There is no language code selected. Do you want to select a language code first?
Do you want to save the current changes?
There is a new version {0} of Git Extensions available
Check not just objects in GIT_OBJECT_DIRECTORY ($GIT_DIR/objects), but also the ones found in alternate object pools.
trans-unit.target: Controlla non solo oggetti in GIT_OBJECT_DIRECTORY ($GIT_DIR/objects), ma anche quello trovate in pool di oggetti alternativi.

trans-unit.source: Do not consider commits that are referenced only by an entry in a reflog to be reachable.
trans-unit.target: Non considerare raggiungibili commit che sono referenziati solo da un elemento in un reflog

trans-unit.source: Print out objects that exist but that aren't readable from any of the reference nodes.
trans-unit.target: Elenca gli oggetti che esistono ma che non sono leggibili da alcuno dei nodi referenziati.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete all dangling objects?
trans-unit.target: Sei sicuro di voler cancellare tutti gli oggetti vaganti?

trans-unit.source:
{0} Tags created.
Do not forget to delete these tags when finished.
trans-unit.target: Sono stati creati {0} tag. Non dimenticare di cancellare questi tag quando hai finito.

trans-unit.source: Double-click on a row for quick view
trans-unit.target: Fai doppio-click su una riga che contiene lo SHA1 per vedere l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source:
By default only unreferenced objects that are older than 2 weeks are removed when cleaning up the database. All other object are only deleted when you run "Remove all dangling objects"
Check commits you want to recover and press Recover button Context menu for additional operations
trans-unit.target: Per default, quando si effettua la pulizia del database, vengono rimossi solo oggetti che sono piÃ¹ vecchi di 2 settimane. Tutti gli altri oggetti sono cancellati solo quando si esegue "Cancella tutti gli oggetti vaganti".

trans-unit.source: Could not download the commit-msg file. Please install the commit-msg hook manually.
Gerrit requires a commit-msg hook to be installed. Do you want to install the commit-msg hook into your repository?
The remote "{0}" specified with the "defaultremote" setting in the .gitreview file does not refer to a configured remote. Either create this remote or change the setting in the .gitreview file.
Cannot find the ".gitreview" file in the working directory.
The "host" setting in the .gitreview file is mandatory.
The "port" specified in the .gitreview file may only contain digits.
The "project" setting in the .gitreview file is mandatory.
Check for uncommitted changes in checkout branch dialog
Close Process dialog when process succeeds

trans-unit.target: Segui le rinomine nella storia del file (sperimentale)

trans-unit.source: Show current working directory changes in revision graph (slow!)
Show console window when executing git process
Show repository status in browse dialog (number of changes in toolbar, restart required)

trans-unit.source: Show stash count on status bar in browse window
trans-unit.target: Visualizza il contatore delle modifiche nascoste nella finestra 'sfoglia'

trans-unit.source: Open last working directory on startup
Use FileSystemWatcher to check if index is changed
trans-unit.target: Usa FileSystemWatcher per controllare se l'indice Ã¨ cambiato
Mostra grafo delle revisioni nel log di commit

trans-unit.source: Limit number of commits that will be loaded at startup

trans-unit.target: Timeout ricerca rapida nella tabella delle revisioni [ms]

trans-unit.source: Command used to run git (git.cmd or git.exe)
trans-unit.target: Comando usato per eseguire git (git.cmd o git.exe)

trans-unit.source: Path to linux tools (sh). Leave empty when it is in the path.
trans-unit.target: Percorso per gli strumenti Linux (sh). Lasciare vuoto se Ã¨ nel PATH

trans-unit.source: Git Extensions can use msysgit or cygwin to access git repositories. Set the correct paths below.
trans-unit.target: GitExtensions puÃ² utilizzare mSysGit o cygwin per accedere ai repository Git. Imposta i percorsi corretti qui sotto.

trans-unit.source: The global config file located in the location stored environment variable %HOME%. By default %HOME% will be set to %HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH% if empty. Change the default behaviour only if you experience problems.
trans-unit.target: Il file di configurazione globale situato nella posizione memorizzata nella variable ambiente %HOME%. Di default %HOME% sarÃ impostata, se vuota, a %HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH%. Cambiare il comportamento default solo se si hanno problemi.

trans-unit.source: Checkout as-is, commit as-is ("core.autocrlf" is set to "false")
trans-unit.target: Checkout invariato, commit invariato ("core.autocrlf" impostato a "false")

trans-unit.source: Checkout as-is, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "input")
trans-unit.target: Checkout invariato, commit con terminatori stile-Unix ("core.autocrlf" impostato a "input")

trans-unit.source: Checkout Windows-style, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "true")
trans-unit.target: Checkout stile-Windows, commit con terminatori stile-Unix ("core.autocrlf" impostato a "true")

trans-unit.source: You need to set the correct path to git before you can change global settings.
trans-unit.target: Bisogna impostare il percorso corretto di git prima di poter cambiare le impostazioni globali.

Since this repository has submodules, it's necessary to update them on every checkout.

There are no commits made to this repository yet.
If this is a normal repository, these steps are recommended: - Make sure you have a proper .gitignore file in your repository - Commit files using commit
If this is a central repository (bare repository without a working directory): - Push changes from another repository

trans-unit.source: Specify which ssh client to use

OpenSSH is a commandline tool. PuTTY is more userfriendly to use for windows users, but requires the PuTTY authentication client to run in the background. When OpenSSH is used, command line dialogs are shown!
trans-unit.target: OpenSSH Ã¨ uno strumento a riga di comando. PuTTY Ã¨ piÃ¹ user-friendly per utenti Windows, ma richiede il client di autenticazione PuTTY in esecuzione in background. Quando si usa OpenSSH, vengono visualizzate finestre della linea di comando!
